amendment.description: To limit the countries to which Federal financial assistance may be targeted under this Act.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 5078 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 70 - 24. Record Vote Number: 175.
Amendment SA 5078 proposed by Senator DeMint. (consideration: CR S6642; text: CR S6642) To limit the countries to which Federal financial assistance may be targeted under this Act.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 5078 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 70 - 24. Record Vote Number: 175.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5078 proposed by Senator DeMint.
